problem.markdown: 2.The hold time of the register is ( ) the time output must be held stable after the rising edge of the clock ( ) the time output must be held stable before the rising edge of the clock (x) the time input must be held stable after the rising edge of the clock ( ) the time input must be held stable before the rising edge of the clock
problem.p: 2.The hold time of the register is

choicegroup.choice: the time output must be held stable after the rising edge of the clock
the time output must be held stable before the rising edge of the clock
the time input must be held stable after the rising edge of the clock
the time input must be held stable before the rising edge of the clock
